settings.heading: About this Brand
settings.text: With 1-5 homes susceptible to mould, Mr mould mission is to provide the most effective eco-friendly, high-quality products that combat and prevent mould

settings.text:
• Complete solution for combating mould growth and protecting your home with an all-in-one kit.
  • Premium-quality MR MOULD Mould-Resistant Emulsion Paint provides long-lasting protection against black mould growth on walls and ceilings.
  • Available in brilliant white and magnolia with a soft sheen finish, resisting mould growth even in condensation-prone areas.
  • Fast-drying formula enables easy brush or roller application, leaving behind a fully washable surface for hassle-free maintenance.
  • Dual-action MR MOULD Mould Removal and Prevention Kit eliminates mould and prevents further infestation, providing immediate relief and long-term protection.
  • Part 1, MR MOULD Mould Eliminator, delivers astonishing visual results in less than three minutes, swiftly removing mould and mildew from various household surfaces.
  • Part 2, MR MOULD Mould Sanitiser, offers long-term protection against mould regrowth, killing mould spores, sterilizing treated areas, and preventing future infestations.
  • Easy-to-use kit components include mould eliminator, mould sanitiser, microfiber cloth, and protective rubber gloves, ensuring safe and effective application.

settings.heading: How Mr Mould - Anti-mould Kit Works
PREPARE
settings.text: Ensure the affected area is clean and dry before application. Remove any visible Mould or mildew by scrubbing the surface with soap and water. Allow the area to dry completely before proceeding.

settings.heading: SPRAY
settings.text: Shake the MR MOULD - Anti-Mould Spray bottle well before use. Hold the bottle upright and spray the affected area from a distance of approximately 20-30 centimeters. Apply a generous amount of spray to thoroughly cover the Mould or mildew-infested surface.

settings.heading: ADDITIVE
settings.text: If you're painting the surface, add the MR MOULD - Anti-Mould Additive to the paint according to the manufacturer's instructions. Stir the paint thoroughly to ensure even distribution of the additive.

settings.heading: PAINT
settings.text: Apply the paint mixture containing the MR MOULD - Anti-Mould Additive onto the prepared surface using a brush, roller, or sprayer. Ensure even coverage over the entire surface, and apply additional coats as needed.

settings.heading: WAIT
settings.text: Allow the spray and/or paint to dry completely according to the manufacturer's instructions. This typically involves waiting for the product to become touch dry and cure fully, which may take several hours or longer depending on environmental conditions.

settings.heading: PROTECT
settings.text: After cleaning and painting, use the MR MOULD - Anti-Mould Surface Protector to apply a protective barrier over the treated area. Follow the instructions on the product label for proper application.

settings.heading: PREVENT
settings.text:
To prevent future Mould or mildew growth, consider addressing any underlying moisture issues in the area. Improve ventilation, repair leaks, and reduce humidity levels to create an environment less conducive to Mould and mildew growth.

Using the MR MOULD - Anti-Mould Kit as directed can effectively eliminate Mould and mildew and help prevent their return.
Superior Mould Resistance

settings.text: MR MOULD's unique formula creates a persistent protective barrier, distinguishing MR MOULD from other paints that rely on temporary chemical solutions which degrade over time.
